agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Urban Affairs TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Thursday, March 21, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Angie Button The Committee will meet to hear the following: HB 59 Swanson Relating to the system by which an application for a low income housing tax credit is scored. HB 96 Swanson Relating to the evaluation of an application for a low income housing tax credit. HB 416 Guerra | et al. Relating to the system by which an application for a low income housing tax credit is scored. HB 1215 Collier Relating to the allocation of low income housing tax credits. HB 1839 Thompson, Senfronia Relating to the allocation of housing tax credits to developments within proximate geographical areas. HB 1881 Calanni Relating to application requirements for low income housing tax credits for developments financed through the private activity bond program. HB 1973 Button | et al. Relating to the system by which an application for a low income housing tax credit is scored. HB 2943 Button Relating to the system by which an application for a low income housing tax credit is scored. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
